sen.e: Koraifuteisho is a textbook on poetry that was established in the beginning of the Kamakura period.

sen.e: The initial edition is said to have been written by the courtier and poet, FUJIWARA no Toshinari at the request of Imperial Princess Shikishi (1149-1201), a princess of Cloistered Emperor Goshirakawain.
